long_description: The Leupold BX-1 Yosemite(R) 8x30mm Waterproof Binoculars are easily adjustable and offer ample power and field of view for kids and adults to enjoy in the backyard or on vacations and day trips. BX-1 Yosemite Binoculars can be adjusted to fit the hands and interpupillary distance of everyone from adults to children. Fully multicoated lenses ensure optimal brightness, resolution, contrast and color fidelity. BAK-4 porro prisms provide a clear, crisp image. Excellent close focus lets you view clear, bright images of objects only 11 ft. away. Large, central focus wheel and adjustable diopter make focus easy to achieve and maintain, even while wearing gloves. Twist-down eyecups make it easy for users wearing glasses to enjoy a full field of view. Rugged, waterproof nitrogen-filled construction can be counted on in the worst weather. Leupold BX-1 Yosemite 8x30mm Waterproof Binoculars include a carrying case, neck strap and a lens cloth.
short_description: The Leupold BX-1 Yosemite(R) 8x30mm Waterproof Binoculars are easily adjustable and offer ample power and field of view for kids and adults to enjoy in the backyard or on vacations and day trips.
